metadata.title: CVE-2015-6748 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jsoup before 1.8.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjsoup-java - 1.7.3-ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jsoup package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.3-ubuntu0.1~esm2').
